posts.postText:
Offender name?: KomanderKBG
Which Server?: TTT
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:0:23386300
What the Offender did?: He RDMed the traitor at the start of the round. Damage logs showed Rose didn't do any of the damage, and he killed her. I told him he would get a slay at the end of the round because I had enough proof and he left the server.
Admins on?: None, me as mod, but no admins.
Proof?: 

http://i54.tinypic.com/jg2s5d.png
http://i54.tinypic.com/n3l0uo.png

At least Nyteofwintry avenged Rose :)
But still, that's pretty fucked up
